Task.Title: DragonBoat Festival Pack
Task.AcceptTalk: 115｛In celebration of the Dano day, MU Origin will be sending out a celebration gift to all players. We’d like to wish everyone a happy and refreshing summer, and to enjoy playing MU!｝
Task.CompleteTalk: 115｛Surit-nal Gift: 10 Million Bound Zen, 1 Million Magic Stone, Jewel of Bless x20, Jewel of Soul x20, Seal of Ascension (x5) x5, Seal of Ascension (x3) x10, Guardian Spirit x1｝

Task.Title: National Day Gift Pack 1
Task.AcceptTalk: 115｛National Foundation Day Gift 1: Jewel of Bless x1, Condors Feather x2, 1 Million EXP. Can be received on October 1st｝
Task.CompleteTalk: 115｛National Foundation Day Gift 1: Jewel of Bless x1, Condors Feather x2, 1 Million EXP. Can be received on October 1st｝

Task.Title: National Day Gift Pack 2
Task.AcceptTalk: 115｛National Foundation Day Gift 1: Jewel of Guardian x1, Condors Feather x5, 1 Million EXP. Can be received on October 4th｝
Task.CompleteTalk: 115｛National Foundation Day Gift 1: Jewel of Guardian x1, Condors Feather x5, 1 Million EXP. Can be received on October 4th｝

Task.Title: National Day Gift Pack 3
Task.AcceptTalk: 115｛National Foundation Day Gift 1: Jewel of Soul x2, Condors Flame x2, 1 Million EXP. Can be received on October 7th｝
Task.CompleteTalk: 115｛National Foundation Day Gift 1: Jewel of Soul x2, Condors Flame x2, 1 Million EXP. Can be received on October 7th｝

Task.Title: Halloween Gift Pack
Task.AcceptTalk: 115｛Halloween Gift: Bound Diamond x500, 30000 Star Essence, 10 Million Bound Zen. Can be received between October 31st - November 1st.｝
Task.CompleteTalk: 115｛Halloween Gift: Bound Diamond x500, 30000 Star Essence, 10 Million Bound Zen. Can be received between October 31st - November 1st.｝
